scripts.build: pnpm build:validation && pnpm build:sdk && pnpm --filter "linode-manager" build
scripts.up: pnpm install:all && pnpm build:validation && pnpm build:sdk && pnpm start:all
scripts.up:expose: pnpm install:all && pnpm build:validation && pnpm build:sdk && pnpm start:all:expose
scripts.start:all: concurrently -n api-v4,validation,manager -c blue,yellow,green "pnpm --filter "@linode/api-v4" dev" "pnpm --filter "@linode/validation" dev" "pnpm --filter "linode-manager" dev"
scripts.start:all:expose: concurrently -n api-v4,validation,manager -c blue,yellow,green "pnpm --filter "@linode/api-v4" dev" "pnpm --filter "@linode/validation" dev" "pnpm --filter "linode-manager" dev --host"
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf packages/@linode/api-v4/node_modules && rm -rf packages/manager/node_modules && rm -rf packages/@linode/validation/node_modules
